attributes.action: Scrap tuition fees for University/College students 2020-2021
attributes.additional_details:
The government have failed to keep a hand on this pandemic, the least they could do is compensate the students.
This isn’t full time teaching therefore it shouldn’t be full priced at all.
attributes.background:
Students in higher education ie uni, college etc have been neglected throughout this whole pandemic. 
They should not be paying for full time courses with no face to face teaching.
They have missed out on valuable teaching time and practical work for nearly a whole semester.
